site.title: Esteban Flores - Full-Stack & Mobile Developer
site.description: Portfolio of Esteban Flores, Full-Stack and Mobile Developer specializing in Laravel, Ionic, and agricultural solutions

hero.name: Esteban Flores
hero.title: Full-Stack & Mobile Developer
hero.tagline: Building solutions for agriculture and business with 9+ years of experience

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm a Full-Stack and Mobile Developer with over 6 years of experience building web and mobile applications for agriculture and business sectors.
about.bio2: Specialized in creating efficient solutions using Laravel, Ionic, Kotlin, and modern web technologies. Passionate about solving real-world problems through technology.

degree1.title: Bachelor's Degree in Administrative Computer Systems
degree1.description: Specialized in software development, databases, and systems architecture.

degree2.title: Master's in Quality Management
degree2.description: Focused on process optimization, quality assurance, and project management.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've worked on throughout my career

cesave.title: Phytosanitary Management System
cesave.description: Web and mobile platform for managing crop health, producer permits, and agricultural monitoring for CESAVE Sonora.

permits.title: System for Issuing the Single Planting Permit
permits.description: National and state planting permit management system with real-time tracking and approval workflows.

mobile.title: Native Android Suite - SIAFESON
mobile.description: Suite of native Android applications developed with Kotlin for phytosanitary field monitoring. Includes 3+ optimized apps with MVVM architecture, Room Database for offline persistence, and real-time data synchronization.

siafeson.title: SIAFESON Mobile Suite
siafeson.description: Suite of 18 specialized mobile applications for phytosanitary monitoring of pests and diseases in crops (weevil, whitefly, grasshopper, Diaphorina, etc.). Each app enables field data capture, offline synchronization, and real-time reporting.
apps: SIMA - Avocado Regulated Pests Monitoring System
SIMARP - Pepper Spider Mite Monitoring System
SIMDIACQT - Diaphorina Chemical Control Backyards System
SIPVID - Spider and Leafhopper Trapping System
SIPVIDCQ - Spider and Leafhopper Chemical Control System

csremas.title: CSREMAS - Weather Network
csremas.description: Native iOS application built with SwiftUI for Sonora's Automated Weather Stations Network (REMAS). Provides real-time weather data, forecasts, reference evapotranspiration, and data visualization for agricultural zones.

sutues.title: SUTUES - Union Portal
sutues.description: Web platform for the State University of Sonora Workers Union. Built with Laravel, Vue.js, Bootstrap, and Inertia.js for publishing news, announcements, reports, and communication with union members.

cesave.title: Web & Mobile Developer
cesave.description: Development of web projects in Laravel and mobile applications to address phytosanitary problems of crops, national and state planting permits.

fidelity.title: Web & Mobile Developer
fidelity.description: Development of web projects with Laravel for local companies in Hermosillo.

teknol.title: Web Developer
teknol.description: Development of web applications with Laravel and Angular for marketing solutions for companies and institutions in Hermosillo, Sonora.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm currently open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
